extends java.lang.Object

Processes a document's user fields.

setFields

public static void setFields(OdfFileDom dom,
                             java.lang.Object model)
Replaces the user fields on a OdfFileDom with the values retrieved by evaluating each field's name as an OGNL expression against a specified model object.
Values are checked for illegal characters.

Parameters:
dom - TextDocument on which the fields are replaced by values.
model - OGNL model object.
